main event: Five Shelby residents reported seeing unidentified flying objects in the sky over Shelby, NC, on April 8, 1950.
interesting points: The objects were seen traveling at a high speed for at least two minutes,The objects appeared to be round and about the size of a wash tub,The objects had a glowing aura around them,The sightings were made around 8:30 p.m. on a Saturday night,The objects suddenly disappeared as if they shot straight up into the air.
witness description: residents of Shelby, including the commander of the Foreign Wars Post
